titles.title: Medicare Home Oxygen Therapy Act of 2009
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reform Medicare coverage and reimbursement for home oxygen therapy services.
Medicare Home Oxygen Therapy Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to House Energy and Commerce

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Medicare Home Oxygen Therapy Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise Medicare coverage and reimbursement requirements for home oxygen therapy services, providing separate coverage of home oxygen therapy services and payment for such services based on a single bundled payment rate.
